short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly search and access objects, flows, and more in Salesforce to streamline your workflow and save time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SF Quick Search is a lightweight and efficient tool designed for Salesforce developers and administrators who need to quickly search and directly access objects, flows, permission sets, custom labels, and other elements within their Salesforce environment. With SF Quick Search, you simplify your workflow by reducing the time spent manually navigating through the platform. 

Help us improve this wonderful extension.
https://gitlab.com/silviopd/sfquicksearch

Recommendation: when an update is made, itâ€™s advisable to refresh within the modal or clear the data using the button at the top of the quick search in the extension.
